{'yearid': '2022', 'monthid': '01', 'day.response: On January 15, 2022, Trinidad & Tobago reported a total of 512 new Covid-19 cases. The day also saw 8 reported deaths due to the virus. There were 145 recoveries recorded, bringing the total number of active cases to 7,830. The healthcare system also reported that 62% of ICU beds were occupied, indicating a high level of stress on medical resources. Public health officials continue to urge the public to follow safety guidelines such as wearing masks, practicing social distancing, and getting vaccinated to help control the spread of the virus. Vaccination centers remained open with extended hours to accommodate more people.
